name: Jet Island
detailed_description:
Jet Island is a giant land mass, floating in space. Nearly 16 km across, stone structures and ruins are scattered across this ancient land. You have an arsenal of tools that will allow you to travel through this world at insane speeds! There are no limits to what you can do. Get ready to experience complete freedom of movement in VR.

Features:

  • Built for VR - Everything from the gameplay, to the physics, to the world is completely built from the ground up in VR. Experience realistic high-speed movement in virtual reality like you never have before.
  • Giant Open World - Jet Island is a completely open 3D world that is 16 km across. When you can move over 500 mph, you need somewhere to fly around! If you can see something miles away, it's real, you can go there. Travel not only on the islands at sea level, but also the astroids in the sky and the caves deep below!
  • Go Solo or Online - Seamlessly play single player or online multiplayer at any time in the same open world. In-game voice allows you to easily socialize and cooperate with other players. Team up against the giant boss or face off in PvP mini-games.
  • Colossal Boss Fight - Millions of years ago, the flying beast of Jet Island destroyed the ancient alien civilization that once lived here. Now he guards this giant floating island in space, claiming it as his own. He is 3.7 miles long and rumbles the ground as he flies overhead. It is up to you and your friends to defeat him!
  • No Limits! - Jet Island is a game about full freedom! There are no speed limits, no invisible walls, no one right path. If you can imagine it, you can do it. If you have the skills, you can fly in ways that were never possible before!

short_description:
Fly anywhere on your hoverboard at extreme speeds!
Swing, slide, and jet in the open world of Jet Island!
Go solo or online with friends!
Learn to skate on any surface, swing from tall buildings, fly in ways you never knew were possible!
Defeat the colossal beast in the sky and be set free in VR!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Have "VR Legs"
